seo.title: CeSIUM - University of Minho Software Engineering Students' Center
seo.description: CeSIUM is the Software Engineering Students' Center of the University of Minho, consisting of a team of volunteer students with the core objective of representing and promoting the Software Engineering course. A united and dynamic organization providing enriching and unique experiences to complement academic life while preparing students for their professional future.

cesium: CeSIUM - University of Minho Software Engineering Students' Center

caos.name: **Open Source** Support Center
caos.description: CAOS handles all software development for CeSIUM, including platforms serving the organization and its events, as well as tools useful for Software Engineering students.
caos.short_description: Responsible for all CeSIUM software development.

dmc.name: **Marketing and Content** Department
dmc.description: DMC manages activity promotion and social media presence, focusing on CeSIUM's visual identity, communications, and photographic documentation of events.
dmc.short_description: Handles activity promotion and social media management.

drem.name: **External Relations and Merchandising** Department
drem.description: DREM establishes and maintains partnerships for member benefits, manages external communications, and oversees merchandise creation for students.

ped.name: **Pedagogical** Department
ped.description: Organizes educational activities like study sessions, lectures, and workshops to support student learning and promote interest in computing fields.
ped.short_description: Coordinates educational activities and academic support.

rec.name: **Recreational** Department
rec.description: Creates social and recreational activities to unite students and enhance academic experience, including gala dinners, game nights, sports tournaments, and parties.
rec.short_description: Organizes social events and recreational activities.

collaborate_card.title: Become a Collaborator
collaborate_card.text: Join one or more departments to contribute to improving your student organization.

member_card.title: Become a Member
member_card.text: Participate in all our events for free and enjoy numerous exclusive benefits.

store_card.title: Store
store_card.text: At the CeSIUM Store, find hoodies, jackets, t-shirts, socks, mugs, stickers, and more. Members receive discounts on all products.

cesium.title: What is **CeSIUM?**
cesium.subtitle: CeSIUM is the Software Engineering Students' Center of the University of Minho, formed by volunteer students dedicated to representing and promoting the Software Engineering course. We provide unique experiences to enhance academic life while preparing students for professional careers.

slide1.title: What is **CeSIUM?**
slide1.subtitle: CeSIUM is the Software Engineering Students' Center of the University of Minho, formed by volunteer students dedicated to representing and promoting the Software Engineering course. We provide unique experiences to enhance academic life while preparing students for professional careers.

slide2.title: Our **Mission**
slide2.subtitle: At CeSIUM, we strive to create a collaborative environment for Software Engineering students. Through events, workshops, and networking opportunities, we help develop technical skills, foster teamwork, and prepare students for real-world challenges.

slide3.title: What We **Offer**
slide3.subtitle: Join us for hackathons, lectures, industry connections, coding sessions, and more. Whether you're looking to expand your skills or find unforgettable opportunities, we've got you covered.

slide4.title: Get **Involved**
slide4.subtitle: Want to join a passionate community? CeSIUM welcomes all Software Engineering students eager to learn, grow, and contribute.

hero.title: University of Minho **Software Engineering** Students' Center
hero.description: In 1995, during the Systems and Informatics Engineering course at UM... A group of 3rd-year students requested official recognition for a student center. This marked the beginning of an organization that, 20 years later, continues its mission of promoting the course and defending student interests.
hero.subtitle: Director of Informatics Department - 2017

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: CeSIUM exists thanks to our dedicated team working daily to maintain operations and create unforgettable experiences for Software Engineering students. Meet them here.

cesium.title: What is CeSIUM?
cesium.subtitle: CeSIUM is the Software Engineering Students' Center of the University of Minho, formed by volunteer students dedicated to representing and promoting the Software Engineering course. We provide unique experiences to enhance academic life while preparing students for professional careers.
cesium.description: We organize course-related activities while promoting social events. We represent student interests to relevant institutions to enhance academic experiences.

images.alt: Software Engineering students during a workshop.
CeSIUM students with mascot Void during the Software Engineering Week.

team.title: Team
team.description: Meet our team members - from leadership to department heads, General Assembly board, and Fiscal Council.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: From SEI - our annual tech week connecting students with innovations and companies - to CoderDojo introducing programming to youth, CeSIUM develops various initiatives. Explore them here.

card.mobile_description: Annual event at UMinho's Gualtar campus combining tech innovations with industry experts.
card.desktop_description: The Software Engineering Week annually brings together cutting-edge technologies and industry leaders at UMinho's Gualtar campus, offering students an exceptional program.

card.mobile_description: Annual 48-hour programming competition for project development.
card.desktop_description: Bugsbyte Hackathon is an annual programming competition where teams develop impactful tech solutions over 48 hours.

card.mobile_description: Global volunteer movement teaching programming to 7-17 year olds.
card.desktop_description: CoderDojo Braga is part of a global non-profit movement teaching programming to youth, demonstrating how coding can positively change the world.

departments.title: Departments
departments.subtitle: Our operations are divided into 5 departments focused on different organizational areas. Discover them here.
departments.description: CeSIUM departments handle various organizational aspects including event planning, software development, content creation, partnership management, and more.

hero.title: Become a Collaborator of
hero.description: Join CeSIUM with a simple registration. Become part of our team today.

join_team.title: Join the Team
join_team.description: Want to meet new people, engage in a dynamic environment, and learn skills relevant to your future career? Join us as a collaborator! Meet the team waiting to welcome you!

choose_department.title: Choose Your Department
choose_department.description: Love coding? Join CAOS. Interested in design? DMC needs you. You can join multiple departments. Learn more about them below or sign up now!

hero.title: Become a Member of
hero.description: Unlock benefits, partnerships, and discounts with a membership card.

exclusive_partnerships.title: Exclusive Partnerships
exclusive_partnerships.description: Enjoy free coffee with meals, discounts on music lessons and driving courses, special offers at local businesses, and more.

participate.title: Free Event Participation
participate.description: Your membership grants free or discounted access to karaoke nights, workshops, board game sessions, special events like Magusto and Software Engineering Night, and more.

member_kit.title: Member Kit
member_kit.description: Receive a starter pack including exclusive t-shirts, notebooks, stickers, pens, and a tote bag.

room_acess.title: CeSIUM Room Access
room_acess.description: Access our student lounge anytime and enjoy our pantry with discounted snacks and drinks.

represent.title: Student Representation
represent.description: CeSIUM advocates for student interests with university authorities - your membership strengthens our voice.

discounts.title: Merch Discounts
discounts.description: Get 30%+ discounts on store items including apparel, stationery, and accessories.

advantages.title: Lifetime Benefits
advantages.description: Membership benefits never expire - your one-time registration fee grants lifetime access. These are the permanent advantages we provide as part of your CeSIUM membership:

details: Membership requires a one-time fee of €10. Benefits never expire and have no general limitations unless specific benefits inherently include such conditions. Payment can only be made in cash, in person at the CeSIUM office.
As a member, you'll always maintain access to all partnerships we offer. However, partnership terms may change or partnerships may be discontinued.
The member kit includes an assortment of items that may vary between kits, based on random selection criteria and gift availability.
During certain occasions within opening hours, the CeSIUM room may be closed for internal activities (e.g., meetings or events).

partners.title: Partnerships
partners.description: CeSIUM members enjoy exclusive partnership benefits. Discover all available offers and discounts.

perks.description: **10% discount** on purchases over €7 (excludes Wednesdays and Sundays).
**30% discount** on all repairs done in the Braga store.
**Offer of two accessories worth €20** with the purchase of a smartphone priced over €150.

**Free drink** with Special Burger, American Toast, Salmon Toast, or Special Hot Dog menus.

**Fanta, Nestea, Water, Sprite, Ginger ale**
**€5 off** all activities (music, dance, martial arts, theater).
**3 extra emblems** free with academic attire purchase.
